channel.title: `Unholypkerz317 First Release. - Please Give Me FeedBack - Ty
channel.description:
This is my first release, I am not a really good coder.. I mainly know the basic's
Ok well,
[b][size=10pt]Please Give Me FeedBack, On Wether To Continue OR Not,[/size][/b]
- New Custom Barrows, Made by me: Dylan. - New Command list - Cleaned - New Help list - Cleaned - New Info list - Cleaned - New Rules list - Cleaned - New Home Area - New Shopping Area - New Training Area - Rock Crabs - NPC Talking - Added Ancients Altar, - No more quest needed. - Moved Slayer Area (Slayer Tower) - Npc's give Slayer Xp. - Mining - Woodcutting - Herblore - Fletching - Theieving - Firemaking - Cooking - Fishing & More.
- Administrators cannot attack other players, - Other players cannot attacking administrators.
Server Pictures Atm- [IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/homearea.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/gilesnpc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/dimintheisguide.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/barrowstele-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/rockcrabtraining.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/slayernpc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/commandlist.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/infolist.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/ruleslist.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/serverhelp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/wildywarning.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/pkingadminsdisabled.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/pkingdisabledforadmin.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i415.photobucket.com/albums/pp236/rdspkerz/yell4members.png[/img]
Server Base - Figment 4.5
Credits
Figment - 50%
Me - 50%
Its not really good, but its my first soo...
I will be making v.2 alot better..
Download Link - http://uppit.com/P5UYG0
